text: Hindmarch is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Anya Hindmarch (born 1968), British fashion accessories designer *Bob Hindmarch (born 1930), Canadian professor and ice hockey coach *Dave Hindmarch (born 1958), Canadian former professional ice hockey player *Paul Hindmarch (born 1988), English cricketer *Rob Hindmarch (1961–2002), English footballer *Stephen Hindmarch (born 1989), English footballer
title: Hindmarch
